attributes.action: Give England an official bank holiday should England win the Euros….
attributes.additional_details: Already England have created history by getting to a final since 1966 and all should be allowed to celebrate the occasion if we go all the way and win it….
attributes.background: Approve a one off bank holiday for England to have a bank holiday on Monday 12th July if we win the Euro’s 2020

rejection.details: We're all really proud of the England team for getting to the 2020 European Championship final, but unfortunately they didn't win the match. So we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
